item.title: Waseem Rizvi 26 Verses
item.description: Waseem Rizvi used to be Shia Central Waqf Board Chairman. He filed a petition in the Supreme Court appealing to remove 26 verses from the Quran arguing those verses promote terrorism. He recently converted to Hinduism and got a new name Jitendra Narayan Singh Tyagi. As of now, Mr. Tyagi is in Jail for allegedly hurting religious sentiments. Below is the list of those verses with Nepali translation (copied from Quoran Translation to Nepali from हज्रत मिर्जा ताहिर अहमद published by Islam International Publications Limited (2001).

item.title: The Effects Of Anglo-Indian Education
item.description: Book - India and Christian Missions Author - Rev. Edward Storrow, of the London Missionary Society, Calcutta Published Date - 1859 URL - https://archive.org/details/indiaandchristi00storgoog In particular, Page 124, Appendix C is highly relevant for us today. Emphasis all mine. The Hindu sacred writings profess to teach, not only all that it is needful to know about religion, but about science, philosophy, and history, as well. Geography and astronomy are supposed as really to be subjects of inspired authoritative teaching as theology.
